original_title: 「だりぃ～」が毎朝の口癖ですよね？でもそんなあなたが大好き!いつまでもあなたの可愛いペットでいさせて下さいね。
overview: I'm Mio Mio is kept by you. In the locker of the company where you work. Mio will do whatever you say because she loves you so much! Early in the morning, when you come to work, I walk with you through the empty office like a dog. In order to heal you from overtime fatigue, Mio gently and carefully sucks with your mouth. Even if you are tied up by a business partner and accused of candles and vibes, you will desperately endure if you want! Because Mio loves you! !
title: "Oh Boy, Do I Feel Tired!" That's What You Always Say Every Morning, Right? But I Love That About You! So Please Allow Me To Always Stay By Your Side, As Your Loving Little Pet. Aoi Kururugi
